channel.title: [Req]Help Please[Req]

item.title: [Req]Help Please[Req]
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

Ok, i just downloaded a pretty good base my friend Arham has made, it is a pi and is called realm onwards.
Can someone please teach me how to recolor items?
Here is an example of one of the ints in itemdef2.java

case 15051: itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID = 51844; itemDef.modelZoom = 1743; itemDef.modelRotationY = 789; itemDef.modelRotationX = 69; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0; itemDef.anInt165 = 51797; //male wield model itemDef.anInt200 = 51819; //femArmModel itemDef.name = "Slayer helmet"; itemDef.description = "Slayer full helm for slayer.".getBytes();//examine. break;

Read full topic
